mapper.insert: INSERT INTO service_appointment (application_id, service_id, user_id, appointment_time, location, notes, status, create_time, update_time) VALUES (#{application_id}, #{service_id}, #{user_id}, #{appointment_time}, #{location}, #{notes}, #{status}, #{create_time}, #{update_time})
mapper.select: SELECT sap.*, a.username, si.title as service_title, si.service_type FROM service_appointment sap LEFT JOIN account a ON sap.user_id = a.id LEFT JOIN service_info si ON sap.service_id = si.id WHERE sap.id = #{id}

SELECT sap.*, a.username, si.title as service_title, si.service_type FROM service_appointment sap LEFT JOIN account a ON sap.user_id = a.id LEFT JOIN service_info si ON sap.service_id = si.id WHERE sap.application_id = #{applicationId}

SELECT sap.*, si.title as service_title, si.service_type FROM service_appointment sap LEFT JOIN service_info si ON sap.service_id = si.id WHERE sap.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY sap.appointment_time DESC
SELECT sap.*, a.username FROM service_appointment sap LEFT JOIN account a ON sap.user_id = a.id WHERE sap.service_id = #{serviceId} ORDER BY sap.appointment_time DESC
